title: (x) san fran national parks - custom lettering by Michael Schwab
author: drarwin

comments.content:
This has been discussed before in several threads. It's custom lettering by the artist, Michael Schwab. He's also designed a proprietary font based on the letters.

As alternatives, you might like [Eagle](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023154543/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Eagle&affid=99346), [Mayo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023154543/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fountain/mayo_pro/?affid=99346), and [Mostra](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023154543/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/mark_simonson_studio/mostra_nuova_family_ot/?affid=99346).

WOW, sorry for the repeat question but thanks for the swift answer.  
I am going to look up his works, I just fell in love with the style
